sentences.sContent: A third of accidental deaths occur in the home.
sentences.sCn: 有三分之一的意外死亡发生在家里。

sentences.sContent: ...wastage tends to occur primarily at the farmer-producer end of the supply chain...
...they occur prior to the individual's twenty-second birthday...
...But assaults often occur on Friday and Saturday nights...
...It’s the dangers parents can’t—and may never—quantify that occur all of sudden...
...Stereotyping can occur in public speaking classes when trying to choose a speech topic...

remMethod.val: oc ＋ cur(跑) → 跑过去看发生了什么事 → 发生

words.tran: 正在发生的；偶然发生的
